de.amr.plt.rcParkingRobot

Class AndroidHmiPLT

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.amr.plt.rcParkingRobot.AndroidHmiPLT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAndroidHmi

    public class AndroidHmiPLT
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAndroidHmi
    Reference implementation of Android HMI module for communication with NXT robot. The module is used by instantiating it with name and address of a NXT, and calling connect(). Once connection is established and NXT is working, information can be requested commands can be sent.
    Author:
    PLT

    • Nested Class Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Connects to the NXT remote device specified by nxtName and nxtAddress.

      Returns CurrentStatus which is one of (DRIVING,PARKING,INACTIVE,EXIT).

      Returns number of detected parking slots (value changes during "Scout" mode).

      Returns a ParkingSlot with the given ID.

      Returns bundled current X and Y location , heading angle phi, robot speed and distance to other objects in all 4 directions.

        public void setMode(parkingRobot.INxtHmi.Mode mode)
